duties_responsibilities.duty: Analyze high-throughput data sets related to asthma and other immunologic diseases using transcriptional profiling and multi-omics approaches.

Collaborate with large NIH funded consortiums including the Inner City Asthma Consortium (ICAC), Immuno Phenotyping Assessment in a COVID-19 Cohort (IMPACC), Human Immunology Project Consortium (HIPC), and others.
Understand the molecular mechanisms of disease risk, progression, and response to treatment.
